titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of Cesar Chavez's birthday, March 31, as National Border Control Day.
Expressing support for the designation of Cesar Chavez's birthday, March 31, as National Border Control Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

bill.summary: Expresses support for: (1) the designation of National Border Control Day, and (2) Cesar Chavez's efforts to educate Americans about the harmful effects of illegal immigration.
